reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I <3 THIS BOOK
reviews.reviewText: tldr: BUY THE FREAKING BOOK.it’s beast boy, who’s my second favorite character. plus gabriel piccolo, who’s my favorite artist. add kami garcia, who’s a great writer, and it’s literally one of the greatest books in existence, i kid you not. in my opinion, the picolo/garcia teen titans series is essential for EVERY teen titans fan. in fact, these books would be great for someone who’s never even seen teen titans…the graphic novels got me into the show lol. however, i do recommend reading it in order. not that i read them out of order or anything…heh…read it!! and kami & gabriel deserve so much recognition for this series, it really is so good. it’s really refreshing to see REALISTIC teenage “superheroes.” pumped for the starfire book!!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Beast Boy
reviews.reviewText: This was so painfully Beast Boy and Garfield all wrapped in one. I loved reading it and getting a look into him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved the portrayal of beast boy
reviews.reviewText: Okay so I am very new to the teen titans fandom only just started engaging with it recently starting with the 2003 show so I went into this book knowing nothing about best boys backstory and I loved how it was explained and how the whole time while he was still the beast boy we’ve seen on screen in the past he was much more human he wasn’t just comedic relief he was the main character and this book really gave him layers that the show at least from what I have seen failed to provide.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: My 13 year old does not like to read at all. I purchased this book for my daughter and she read it right away that day and asked for the whole series. Highly recommended for Teen Titans fans. She absolutely loved the artwork in the book, she said, " The artwork is incredible." Even if you are not a fan of Teen Titans, this series of books may sway any comic lover. My daughter can't wait for the new releases to come out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Another amazing installment for this upcoming book series!! (4)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Solid Read for Newbies and Vets of DC Comics
reviews.reviewText: "Teen Titans: Beast Boy" is not exactly what you'd expect from a superhero origin story, but I loved every single minute of it.I've read Teen Titans comics in the past and the best characterizations of Gar is when he has depth, not just a prankster and jokester. While I've read and enjoyed the creators' other graphic novel, "Teen Titans: Raven", I honestly believe that Gar got more characterization and love put into him than his future teammate. I'm glad that the author decided to discuss body image in boys, as that's rarely discussed in YA.You can tell that the writing style is meant for lower level readers, much like "Raven." It's very easy to understand and follow. I will probably always love Gabriel Picolo's art, as I've been following him for years and will continue to do so.A solid read for newbies and veterans of DC Comics.

Me encantó, me encantó! Fue un regalo de cumpleaños de parte de mi esposo, y el sabe que amo Teen Titans y el artista Gabriel Picolo!. El estilo de dibujo y calidad de impresión están preciosos, la historia impecable, un origin story más moderno y con toques de la série original de Teen Titans. Muy recomendable, si eres fan o es regalo para un fan, es lo mejor que puedes comprar.Calidad de la entrega, estuvo bien y sin daños o detalles en el libro.

Assim como Raven, é perfeito!! Traz a história do Gar quando ele descobre seus poderes, em meio a dramas adolescentes. A visão dele é muito realista, os amigos são maravilhosos, e a história é envolvente. Muito bom, recomendo.
Acquistato x mia figlia amante del genere. Rimansta soddisfatta. Consigliato. Amazon impeccabile come sempre.

Amazing book! The story and artwork are soo good! Gabriel's attention to detail is truly spectacular! The quality of the book is excellent as well. It's got a nice, sturdy cover that doesn't scratch easily (my paper loving cat has tried) and smooth pages on the inside! Would recommend!
good graphic novels. The artwork is amazing, but the story line is aimed more for the 9-13 year old age group. So you can gift it to your nephew or niece who likes graphic novels and comic books.
